item.title: Issue 8
item.description: This week we look at binding pocket similarities, improving structures with AlphaFold and Cryo-EM, and a new approach to predict DNA-binding sites

item.title: Issue 7
item.description: This week we look at ligand docking, SARS-CoV-2 variants, and enzyme active site flexibility.

item.title: Issue 6
item.description: This week there’s small molecules in structural contexts and more about AlphaFold2 protein conformations.

item.title: Issue 5
item.description: This week we look at SARS-CoV-2 variants, inducing AlphaFold into giving us multiple states, and filling AlphaFold models with small molecules

item.title: Issue 4
item.description: This week is co-evolution and structural variants, both disease-associated and otherwise

item.title: Issue 3
item.description: This week there’s SARS-CoV-2 structures, protein computing agents, and sequence-structure embeddings.

item.title: Issue 2
item.description: This week we look at modelling proteomes, peptide antibiotics, and antibody design

item.title: Issue 1
item.description: This week we look at conformational diversity, post-translational modifications, integrative structural modelling, pre-training protein sequences, and sequencing proteins.

Pymol script draw_protein.py from pymol import cmd import sys _, pdb_id, issue = sys.argv cmd.fetch(pdb_id) cmd.bg_color("white") cmd.remove("solvent") cmd.zoom() cmd.orient() cmd.set("cartoon_fancy_helices", 1) cmd.set("ambient", 0.5) cmd.set("antialias", 2) cmd.set("cartoon_sampling", 30) cmd.set("ray_trace_mode", 2) cmd.set("ray_trace_color", "0x775abf") cmd.set("ray_opaque_background", "off") cmd.set("ray_trace_gain", 2) cmd.set("ray_trace_disco_factor", 1.) cmd.ray(2000) filename = f"{issue}_pymol.png" cmd.png(str(filename), width=2000, height=2000, dpi=300) cmd.quit() Cropping Uses ImageMagick and smartcrop ./make_post_image <pdb_id> <issue_num> pymol -cq draw_protein.py -- $1 $2 convert $2_pymol.png -trim +repage $2.png ./smartcrop -w 1500 -h 300 -s pyramid $2.
